_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: SimpleCloud
author: support@NeverStopGaming.net

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y git curl unzip

mkdir -p /mnt/server
export HOME=/mnt/server

cd /mnt/server

echo DOWNLOAD!
#curl https://github.com/NeverStopGaming/SimpleCloud-Pterodactyl-egg/download/SimpleCloud.zip --output SimpleCloud.zip
curl -o /mnt/server/SimpleCloud.zip -Li https://NeverStopGaming.net/download/SimpleCloud.zip

echo UNZIP!
unzip SimpleCloud.zip


echo GIVE PERMISSIONS!
chmod 777 runner.jar
chmod 777 launcher.jar
chmod 777 storage/base.jar

rm -r SimpleCloud.zip

eco Finish!
